definition: Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

pinyin: pa4 si1 ka3 san1 jiao3 xing2
pa4 si1 ka3 liu4 bian1 xing2

definition: La Paz, administrative capital of Bolivia, usually written as 拉巴斯

sentences.english: The Oedipus business comes nearer to home.
sentences.chinese: 伊迪帕斯在朝家的方向走。

sentences.english: At three-fifteen the following afternoon, Persky worked his wizardry again.
sentences.chinese: 第二天下午三點十五分，帕斯基再次施展魔法。

sentences.english: An ancient city of northern Egypt east of Alexandria. It was the site of a great temple honoring Serapis.
sentences.chinese: 坎努帕斯埃及北部一座古老城市，位於亞歷山大東部。

sentences.english: Mothers and Papas Polaris 700 four players.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽們和帕帕斯北極星運動員700四。

sentences.english: Mayan Indian group of central Chiapas in southern Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 南墨西哥恰帕斯中部的馬雅印第安人。

sentences.english: One fall-out of tapas is control over nature.
sentences.chinese: 一個屬於淘汰塔帕斯是控制權的性質。

sentences.english: The principle instructors at The Atelier are Dale Redpath and Cyd Wicker.
sentences.chinese: 在這個原則的畫室老師是戴爾雷德帕斯和何秀蘭柳條。

sentences.english: Nello and Patrasche were left all alone in the world.
sentences.chinese: 尼諾和帕斯奇都獨自活在世界上。

sentences.english: I honestly believe Christian Purslow has been open and honest with us.
sentences.chinese: 我當然相信帕斯洛這次所表達出來的誠意。

sentences.english: Not untill 1982 was he rehabilitated his fame.
sentences.chinese: 帕斯直到1982年才被恢復名譽。

sentences.english: Liverpool FC's chairman Martin Broughton and managing director Christian Purslow were also in the High Court.
sentences.chinese: 俱樂部主席布勞頓和總經理帕斯洛同樣在高法出面。

sentences.english: An argument made by Blaise Pascal for believing in God.
sentences.chinese: 一個論點所作出的布萊斯帕斯卡爾相信上帝。

sentences.english: Las Pampas regional police are investigating the death.
sentences.chinese: 拉斯維加斯潘帕斯地區警方正調查死因。

sentences.english: PASCALS, for example, measure the pressure applied to a certain area.
sentences.chinese: 比如，帕斯卡是用來測量某處面積所受壓力的單位。

sentences.english: The next day, Pascal met up with Stone.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，帕斯卡遇到了斯通。

definition: abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]
Kara, city in northern Togo 多哥[Duo1 ge1]/Cara, Karla etc (name)
becquerel (unit of radioactivity, symbol Bq)/abbr. for 貝克勒爾|贝克勒尔[bei4 ke4 le4 er3]
